channel.title: RSC Pkers, The old school Community. List your RSC Names
channel.description: Just curious on, How many of the old schooler's are still actually around, Since i been here from the very begining, Over the years lost touch with many good friends in RSC. Post your RSC User here, Be good to get back in touch with a few.

item.title: RSC Pkers, The old school Community. List your RSC Names
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

[quote=“wicked happy, post:8, topic:358290”][quote author=Old Rsc Player link=topic=454796.msg3330208#msg3330208 date=1283408390]
Mine 60 coal certs, buy r2h, die, mine 60 coal certs, buy r2h, die… repeat.
[/quote]

mine was similar cept mine Fish lob certs, buy r2h pots ammys, die, fish 100 more buy shit then die.[/quote]

we have a lot in common, except I used both methods, legit too. Looking back
I can’t tell which method was more painful

Read full topic
item.source: RSC Pkers, The old school Community. List your RSC Names

I ate a lot of cake too…

item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

i’m famous for scamming the dude who made it to 99 herblaw first (halw gnun) and then another 99 herblaw dude, and a bunch of other randoms.

i am also famous for being the shittiest PKer ever on rsc and loosing 20+ r2hs, and not ever killed someone that dropped a rune item.
